hero.title: Accessibility রাজ্যment
hero.subtitle: Making এটিএম ফ্র্যাঞ্চাইজি opportunities accessible to everyone

content.intro: এটিএম ফ্র্যাঞ্চাইজি ইন্ডিয়া is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continuously improving the user experience for everyone and applying the relevant accessibility standards.

web.content: Our website is designed to be compatible with assistive technologies and follows Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 standards.
items: Keyboard navigation support for all interactive elements
Screen reader compatibility with proper heading structure
High contrast color schemes for better visibility
Alternative text for all images and graphics

visual.content: We understand that visual impairments can affect how people interact with our platform:
items: Large, readable fonts throughout the website
Sufficient color contrast ratios meeting WCAG standards

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.description: We are committed to ensuring digital accessibility for all users

contact.title: Accessibility Feedback
contact.description: We welcome your feedback on accessibility
